description: Removed outputFormat prop. If text output is required call editor.getContent({ format: 'text' }) in any of the event callbacks.

Changed default cloudChannel to '6'. This change is only relevant if you use the 'cloud' version of TinyMCE, i.e., don't host it yourself. The change 'upgrades' TinyMCE to version 6 (see changes here https://www.tiny.cloud/docs/release-notes/6.0-upcoming-changes/). If you want to continue to use TinyMCE version 5, initialize the editor with a specific channel: <Editor  init={{ cloudChannel: '5' }} />
License changed to MIT (from Apache 2) this matches TinyMCE 6 license
